title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7303.2 - Construction and renovation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7303.2 - Construction and renovation

State Regulations
(a) All
plans and specifications for the construction or renovation of a facility shall
be submitted to the State Commission of Correction (the Commission) and the

Office of Children and Family Services (OCFS) for review and
approval. (b) Such approval by the

Commission and OCFS shall be obtained before a construction or renovation
project is advertised for bids. If a bid- ding procedure will not be followed, Commission and OCFS approval must be obtained before any construction or
renovation begins. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7303.2

Adopted

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
